latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting

violations.Violation Summary: Milk observed stored at a temperature above 41 deg F at time of inspection Milk observed stored in child care service beyond the expiration date
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to designate/identify a qualified Education Director
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Children feeding bottles observed stored/used without being properly labeled with childs name and date of preparation at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
